title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Angola 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 2017 to 2018, roughly constant from 2018 to 2019, slightly increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2023.

The line rapidly increased by 700.0% from Year 2017 to 2018,remained stable by 77.5% from Year 2018 to 2019,increased by 325.93% from Year 2019 to 2020, and lastly, increased by 149.57% from Year 2020 to 2021.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 4.13 was reached at Year 2023
The lowest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 0.15 was reported at Year 2017
